Name: Coptic textile
Description: A strip of tapestry and linen. The motif consists of a continuous plant ornament with geometric borders, in green, yellow, orange, purple and blue on a dull rose background.Technique: plain weave background. Tapestry, built up shapes, curved wefts and slits.Ends per inch (warp threads): 32 on ground, 16 on tapestry.Picks per inch (weft threads): 60 on ground, 128 on tapestry.
